title: Bertie's Guide to Life and Mothers
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: She went out into the street. Dr Macgregor was now some  distance away, walking fairly quickly, and had arrived at  the end of Spottiswoode Road. When he turned that corner,  Pat accelerated her pace, although she was careful to keep  sufficiently far away from him so that if he turned and  looked back he might not spot her.
